original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ61
overview: A popular work that collects ghost videos from general posts "It really happened! The 61st installment of the "Cursed Video" series. With the response received from general users, it contains many spiritual videos that arrive one after another from all over the country. There is no doubt that the truth of the fear projected by the camera will freeze your spine involuntarily.
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi No Video 61
